#!/bin/bash
#
# Installation script for Wurm Unlimited
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y upgrade
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl ca-certificates unzip

# Headless setup as per https://www.wurmpedia.com/index.php/Server_administration_(Wurm_Unlimited)#Linux_Headless
apt -y install libswt-gtk3-java xvfb x11vnc

Xvfb :99 &
export DISPLAY=:99

## Installing Wurm Unlimited Dedicated Server

# Download and set up SteamCMD as per https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/SteamCMD#Linux
add-apt-repository multiverse
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt -y update
apt -y install lib32gcc1

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

chown -R root:root /mnt

# Installing Wurm Unlimited
export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 402370 validate +quit

# Copying steamclient.so as per https://www.wurmpedia.com/index.php/Server_administration_(Wurm_Unlimited)#Headless
mkdir -p /mnt/server/nativelibs
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/nativelibs

cd /mnt/server
curl -sSL -o StartWU.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tehguy/eggs/add/wurm-unlimited/steamcmd_servers/wurm_unlimited/StartWU.sh
chmod +x StartWU.sh
